post.description: Creates a new review for an extension

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Review to be created for the extension

parameters.name: pubName
parameters.description: Name of the publisher who published the extension

parameters.name: pubName
parameters.description: Name of the pubilsher who published the extension

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Id of the review which needs to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ReviewPatch object which contains the changes to be applied to the review

parameters.name: pubName
parameters.description: Name of the pubilsher who published the extension

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: Id of the review which needs to be updated

get.description: Returns a list of reviews associated with an extension

parameters.name: publisherName
parameters.description: Name of the publisher who published the extension

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of reviews to retrieve (defaults to 5)

parameters.name: filterOptions
parameters.description: FilterOptions to filter out empty reviews etcetera, defaults to none

parameters.name: beforeDate
parameters.description: Use if you want to fetch reviews older than the specified date, defaults to null

parameters.name: afterDate
parameters.description: Use if you want to fetch reviews newer than the specified date, defaults to null

operationState.description: State of the the AcquisitionOperation for the current user

reason.description: Optional reason to justify current state. Typically used with Disallow state.

defaultOperation.description: Default Operation for the ItemId in this target

itemId.description: The item id that this options refer to

operations.description: Operations allowed for the ItemId in this target

target.description: The target that this options refer to

vSMarketplaceExtensionName.description: Gets or sets the vs marketplace extension name

vSMarketplacePublisherName.description: Gets or sets the vs marketplace publsiher name

answers.description: Gets or sets the Answers, which contains vs marketplace extension name and publisher name

publisherNaturalIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the VS publisher Id

assetDetails.description: Gets or sets the Asset details

assetId.description: Gets or sets the asset id

assetVersion.description: Gets or sets the asset version

customerSupportEmail.description: Gets or sets the customer support email

integrationContactEmail.description: Gets or sets the integration contact email

operation.description: Gets or sets the asset version

planId.description: Gets or sets the plan identifier if any.

publisherId.description: Gets or sets the publisher id

type.description: Gets or sets the resource type

operationStatus.description: Gets or sets the Asset operation status

lang.description: The language for which the title is applicable

lcid.description: The language culture id of the lang parameter

title.description: Actual title to be shown on the UI

assignmentType.description: How the item is being assigned

billingId.description: The id of the subscription used for purchase

itemId.description: The marketplace id (publisherName.extensionName) for the item

operationType.description: The type of operation, such as install, request, purchase

properties.description: Additional properties which can be added to the request.

quantity.description: How many licenses should be purchased

targets.description: A list of target guids where the item should be acquired (installed, requested, etc.), such as account id

associatedProducts.description: The name of the products with which this category is associated to.

categoryName.description: This is the internal name for a category

language.description: This parameter is obsolete. Refer to LanguageTitles for langauge specific titles

languageTitles.description: The list of all the titles of this category in various languages

parentCategoryName.description: This is the internal name of the parent if this is associated with a parent

extensions.description: This is the set of appplications that matched the query filter supplied.

pagingToken.description: The PagingToken is returned from a request when more records exist that match the result than were requested or could be returned. A follow-up query with this paging token can be used to retrieve more results.

resultMetadata.description: This is the additional optional metadata for the given result. E.g. Total count of results which is useful in case of paged results

metadataItems.description: The metadata items for the category

metadataType.description: Defines the category of metadata items

extensionName.description: The ExtensionName component part of the fully qualified ExtensionIdentifier

publisherName.description: The PublisherName component part of the fully qualified ExtensionIdentifier

assetTypes.description: When retrieving extensions with a query; frequently the caller only needs a small subset of the assets. The caller may specify a list of asset types that should be returned if the extension contains it. All other assets will not be returned.

filters.description: Each filter is a unique query and will have matching set of extensions returned from the request. Each result will have the same index in the resulting array that the filter had in the incoming query.

flags.description: The Flags are used to deterine which set of information the caller would like returned for the matched extensions.

results.description: For each filter supplied in the query, a filter result will be returned in the query result.

value.description: The value used in the match based on the filter type.

count.description: The count of the metadata item

name.description: The name of the metadata item

publishedDate.description: Date on which the extension was first uploaded.

releaseDate.description: Date on which the extension first went public.

publishers.description: This is the set of appplications that matched the query filter supplied.

filters.description: Each filter is a unique query and will have matching set of publishers returned from the request. Each result will have the same index in the resulting array that the filter had in the incoming query.

flags.description: The Flags are used to deterine which set of information the caller would like returned for the matched publishers.

results.description: For each filter supplied in the query, a filter result will be returned in the query result.

criteria.description: The filter values define the set of values in this query. They are applied based on the QueryFilterType.

direction.description: The PagingDirection is applied to a paging token if one exists. If not the direction is ignored, and Forward from the start of the resultset is used. Direction should be left out of the request unless a paging token is used to help prevent future issues.

pageNumber.description: The page number requested by the user. If not provided 1 is assumed by default.

pageSize.description: The page size defines the number of results the caller wants for this filter. The count can't exceed the overall query size limits.

pagingToken.description: The paging token is a distinct type of filter and the other filter fields are ignored. The paging token represents the continuation of a previously executed query. The information about where in the result and what fields are being filtered are embeded in the token.

sortBy.description: Defines the type of sorting to be applied on the results. The page slice is cut of the sorted results only.

sortOrder.description: Defines the order of sorting, 1 for Ascending, 2 for Descending, else default ordering based on the SortBy value

operationDetails.description: Gets or sets the operation details

operationId.description: Gets or sets the operation id

percentageCompleted.description: Gets or sets the completed status percentage

statusMessage.description: Gets or sets the status message

id.description: Unique identifier of a review item

productVersion.description: Version of the product for which review was submitted

reply.description: Reply, if any, for this review

updatedDate.description: Time when the review was edited/updated

userId.description: Id of the user who submitted the review

reportedConcern.description: Use when patch operation is FlagReview

reviewItem.description: Use when patch operation is EditReview

productVersion.description: Version of the product when the reply was submitted or updated

reviewId.description: Id of the review, to which this reply belongs

updatedDate.description: Date the reply was submitted or updated

userId.description: Id of the user who left the reply

hasMoreReviews.description: Flag indicating if there are more reviews to be shown (for paging)

displayName.description: User display name that this policy refers to

permissions.description: The extension policy applied to the user

userId.description: User id that this policy refers to

concernText.description: User comment associated with the report

reviewId.description: Id of the review which was reported

userId.description: Id of the user who reported a review
